sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic until softened.
o
Add diced tomatoes, lentils, chickpeas, vegetable broth, cumin, coriander,
turmeric, and salt.
o
Simmer for 30 minutes until lentils are tender.
o
Stir in chopped cilantro and serve warm.
Horta
*

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound dandelion greens
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1/4 cup lemon juice
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Boil dandelion greens
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Boil dandelion greens until tender, then drain.
o
Toss greens with olive oil, lemon juice, and salt.
o
Serve warm or chilled.

sections.title: Boil dandelion greens
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 cups chicken broth
o
1/2 cup sliced mushrooms
o
1/4 cup bamboo shoots
o
1/4 cup tofu
o
2 tablespoons soy sauce
o
2 tablespoons rice vinegar
o
1 tablespoon cornstarch
o
1 teaspoon chili paste
o
1 egg
o
1/4 cup chopped green onions
*

sections.title: Bring chicken broth
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Bring chicken broth to a boil.
o
Add mushrooms, bamboo shoots, tofu, soy sauce, rice vinegar, and chili paste.
o
Mix cornstarch with water and add to the soup, stirring until thickened.
o
Beat egg and slowly pour into the soup, stirring constantly.
o
Garnish with chopped green onions and serve.

sections.title: Bring chicken broth
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 can chickpeas
o
1/4 cup tahini
o
1/4 cup lemon juice
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Drain and rinse
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Drain and rinse chickpeas.
o
Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor.
o
Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth.
o
Serve with a drizzle of olive oil.
Japchae
*

sections.title: Drain and rinse
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
8 ounces sweet potato noodles
o
1/2 pound beef
o
1 small onion
o
1 carrot
o
1 bell pepper
o
1 cup spinach
o
2 tablespoons soy sauce
o
1 tablespoon sesame oil
o
1 tablespoon sugar
o
1 tablespoon sesame seeds
*

sections.title: Cook noodles according
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Cook noodles according to package instructions, then drain.
o
Saute sliced beef, diced onion, julienned carrot, and bell pepper in sesame oil
until cooked.
o
Add spinach and cook until wilted.
o
Mix noodles with soy sauce, sugar, and sesame seeds.
o
Combine with cooked beef and vegetables.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Cook noodles according
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup broccoli
o
1 cup bell peppers
o
1 cup zucchini
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
2 tablespoons jerk seasoning

sections.title: Toss vegetables
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Toss vegetables with minced garlic, jerk seasoning, and olive oil.
o
Roast at 400degF (200degC) until tender.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Toss vegetables
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups flour
o
1/4 cup sugar
o
1 tablespoon baking powder
o
1/2 teaspoon salt
o
1/4 cup butter
o
1/2 cup milk
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Mix flour sugar
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
o
Cut in cold butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
o
Add milk and stir until dough forms.
o
Roll out dough and cut into circles.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve warm.

sections.title: Mix flour sugar
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups rice
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
4 tomatoes
o
1/4 cup tomato paste
o
1/4 cup vegetable oil
o
1 teaspoon thyme
o
1 teaspoon curry powder
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
o
4 cups chicken broth
*

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic in vegetable oil until softened.
o
Add diced tomatoes, tomato paste, thyme, curry powder, salt, and pepper, cook
for 5 minutes.
o
Stir in rice and cook for 2 minutes.
o
Add chicken broth and bring to a boil.
o
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is tender.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 tomatoes
o
1 small onion
o
1 cucumber
o
1/4 cup cilantro
o
1/4 cup lemon juice
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Dice tomatoes onion
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Dice tomatoes, onion, and cucumber.
o
Mix vegetables with chopped cilantro, lemon juice, and salt.
o
Serve chilled.
Kasespatzle (Cheese Noodles)
*

sections.title: Dice tomatoes onion
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups flour
o
1/2 cup milk
o
3 eggs
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/4 teaspoon nutmeg
o
1/4 cup butter
o
1 cup grated cheese
o
1 small onion
*

sections.title: Mix flour milk beaten
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix flour, milk, beaten eggs, salt, and nutmeg to form a batter.
o
Press batter through a spaetzle maker or colander into boiling water.
o
Cook until spaetzle floats to the surface, then drain.
o
Saute sliced onion in butter until golden.
o
Layer spaetzle and grated cheese in a baking dish, top with sauteed onion.
o
Bake at 350degF (175degC) for 15 minutes until cheese is melted.
o
Serve warm.
Kartoffelsalat (Potato Salad)
*

sections.title: Mix flour milk beaten
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 potatoes
o
1 small onion
o
1/4 cup bacon
o
1/4 cup vinegar
o
1/4 cup chicken broth
o
1 tablespoon mustard
o
1 teaspoon sugar
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper

sections.title: Boil potatoes until
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Boil potatoes until tender, then dice.
o
Cook diced bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside.
o
Saute diced onion in bacon fat until softened.
o
Mix vinegar, chicken broth, mustard, sugar, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
o
Combine potatoes, bacon, and onion with the dressing.
o
Serve warm or chilled.

sections.title: Boil potatoes until
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1/2 pound ground beef
o
1/2 pound ground pork
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup breadcrumbs
o
1 egg
o
1 teaspoon oregano
o
1 teaspoon mint
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten
egg, oregano, mint, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
o
Form mixture into meatballs.
o
Heat oil in a pan and fry meatballs until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve warm.
Kibbeh
*

sections.title: Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup bulgur
o
1/2 pound ground beef
o
1 small onion
o
1/4 cup pine nuts
o
1 teaspoon cumin
o
1 teaspoon allspice
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Soak bulgur in water
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Soak bulgur in water until tender, then drain.
o
Mix bulgur with ground beef, diced onion, pine nuts, cumin, allspice, and salt.
o
Form mixture into balls or patties.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve.

sections.title: Soak bulgur in water
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 napa cabbage
o
1/4 cup sea salt
o
1 tablespoon sugar
o
2 tablespoons fish sauce
o
2 tablespoons gochugaru (Korean chili powder)
o
4 cloves garlic
o
1 inch ginger
o
4 green onions
*

sections.title: Cut cabbage into
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Cut cabbage into quarters and soak in salted water for 2 hours.
o
Rinse and drain cabbage.
o
Mix sugar, fish sauce, gochugaru, minced garlic, grated ginger, and chopped
green onions in a bowl.
o
Rub mixture onto cabbage leaves.
o
Pack cabbage into a jar and let ferment at room temperature for 2-3 days.
o
Store in the refrigerator and serve as needed.

sections.title: Cut cabbage into
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound soybean sprouts
o
2 cloves garlic
o
2 tablespoons soy sauce
o
1 tablespoon sesame oil
o
1 tablespoon sesame seeds
*

sections.title: Blanch soybean sprouts
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Blanch soybean sprouts in boiling water for 2 minutes, then drain.
o
Mix minced garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, and sesame seeds in a bowl.
o
Toss sprouts with the dressing.
o
Serve chilled.
Labneh
*

sections.title: Blanch soybean sprouts
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups yogurt
o
1/2 teaspoon salt
o
1/4 cup olive oil
*

sections.title: Mix yogurt with
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix yogurt with salt.
o
Place yogurt in a cheesecloth-lined strainer over a bowl.
o
Let drain in the refrigerator for 24 hours.
o
Transfer labneh to a serving dish and drizzle with olive oil.
o
Serve with pita bread.

sections.title: Mix yogurt with
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1/2 pound ground chicken
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
2 tablespoons fish sauce
o
2 tablespoons lime juice
o
1 tablespoon sugar
o
1 tablespoon rice powder
o
1/4 cup mint
o
1/4 cup cilantro
o
1-2 Thai chilies
*

sections.title: Saute ground chicken
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute ground chicken, diced onion, and minced garlic until cooked.
o
Mix fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, and rice powder in a bowl.
o
Toss chicken with the dressing, chopped mint, cilantro, and sliced chilies.
o
Serve with lettuce leaves.
Lo Mein
*

sections.title: Saute ground chicken
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
8 ounces lo mein noodles
o
1 cup sliced bell peppers
o
1 cup snow peas
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
2 tablespoons soy sauce
o
1 tablespoon oyster sauce
o
1 tablespoon sesame oil
*

sections.title: Cook lo mein noodles
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Cook lo mein noodles according to package instructions, then drain.
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic in sesame oil until fragrant.
o
Add bell peppers and snow peas, stir-fry until tender.
o
Add cooked noodles, soy sauce, and oyster sauce, stir to combine.
o
Serve warm.
Loubia
*

sections.title: Cook lo mein noodles
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups white beans
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
4 tomatoes
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 teaspoon cumin

sections.title: Soak beans overnight
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Soak beans overnight, then cook until tender.
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.
o
Add diced tomatoes, cumin, paprika, and salt, simmer for 10 minutes.
o
Mix beans with tomato sauce and cook for 10 minutes.
o
Stir in chopped cilantro and serve warm.

sections.title: Macaroni and Cheese
sections.context:
Macaroni and Cheese
*

sections.title: Macaroni and Cheese
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups elbow macaroni
o
2 cups milk
o
2 tablespoons butter
o
2 tablespoons flour
o
2 cups shredded cheddar cheese
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Cook macaroni according
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Cook macaroni according to package instructions, then drain.
o
Melt butter in a saucepan, stir in flour to make a roux.
o
Gradually add milk, stirring constantly until thickened.
o
Add cheese, salt, and pepper, stir until melted.
o
Combine cheese sauce with macaroni.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Cook macaroni according
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast
o
1 teaspoon sugar
o
1 cup warm water
o
3 cups flour
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1/4 cup za'atar
*

sections.title: Dissolve yeast and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy.
o
Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture and olive oil.
o
Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled.
o
Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles.
o
Spread za'atar mixed with olive oil on top.
o
Bake at 400degF (200degC) for 10-12 minutes until golden.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Dissolve yeast and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups flour
o
1/4 cup sugar
o
1 tablespoon baking powder
o
1/2 teaspoon salt
o
1/4 cup coconut milk
o
1/4 cup water
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Mix flour sugar
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
o
Add coconut milk and water, stir until dough forms.
o
Roll out dough and cut into triangles.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve warm.
Mandu
*

sections.title: Mix flour sugar
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 package dumpling wrappers
o
1/2 pound ground pork
o
1/2 cup chopped cabbage
o
1/4 cup chopped green onions
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1 tablespoon soy sauce
o
1 teaspoon sesame oil
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Mix ground pork, cabbage, green onions, minced garlic, soy sauce, and sesame
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix ground pork, cabbage, green onions, minced garlic, soy sauce, and sesame
o
Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and fold to seal.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden, then steam for 5 minutes.
o
Serve with dipping sauce.

sections.title: Mix ground pork, cabbage, green onions, minced garlic, soy sauce, and sesame
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup glutinous rice
o
1 cup coconut milk
o
1/4 cup sugar
o
1/4 teaspoon salt
o
2 mangoes
*

sections.title: Rinse rice and soak
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Rinse rice and soak in water for 1 hour.
o
Steam rice until tender.
o
Heat coconut milk with sugar and salt until dissolved.

sections.title: Rinse rice and soak
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 block tofu
o
1/2 pound ground pork
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1 tablespoon chili bean paste
o
2 tablespoons soy sauce
o
1 tablespoon rice wine
o
1 teaspoon sugar
o
1/4 cup chicken broth
o
1 tablespoon cornstarch
o
1/4 cup chopped green onions
*

sections.title: Cut tofu into cubes
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Cut tofu into cubes and set aside.
o
Saute ground pork, diced onion, and minced garlic until browned.
o
Add chili bean paste, soy sauce, rice wine, and sugar, cook for 2 minutes.
o
Add chicken broth and tofu, simmer for 5 minutes.
o
Mix cornstarch with water and add to the pan, stirring until thickened.
o
Garnish with chopped green onions and serve.

sections.title: Cut tofu into cubes
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 potatoes
o
1/2 cup milk
o
1/4 cup butter
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Peel and dice potatoes
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Peel and dice potatoes.
o
Boil potatoes until tender, then drain.
o
Mash potatoes with milk, butter, salt, and pepper.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Peel and dice potatoes
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 onion
o
2 carrots
o
2 celery stalks
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1 zucchini

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced onion, carrots, celery, and minced garlic until softened.
o
Add diced zucchini, tomatoes, and broth.
o
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 20 minutes.
o
Add beans and pasta, cook until pasta is tender.
o
Stir in chopped basil and serve with grated Parmesan cheese.

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 cups dashi broth
o
1/4 cup miso paste
o
1/2 cup tofu
o
1/4 cup green onions
o
1/4 cup seaweed
*

sections.title: Heat dashi broth
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Heat dashi broth until warm.
o
Dissolve miso paste in a small amount of broth, then add to the pot.
o
Add diced tofu and seaweed.
o
Simmer for 5 minutes.
o
Garnish with sliced green onions and serve.

sections.title: Heat dashi broth
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 bananas
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1 bell pepper
o
2 tomatoes
o
1 cup coconut milk
o
1/4 cup cilantro
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced onion, minced garlic, and sliced bell pepper until softened.
o
Add diced tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
o
Stir in coconut milk, sliced bananas, salt, and pepper.
o
Simmer for 10 minutes.
o
Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve warm.

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups flour
o
1 cup semolina
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 cup water
o
1/4 cup butter
*

sections.title: Mix flour semolina
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix flour, semolina, and salt in a bowl.
o
Add water and knead until smooth.
o
Divide dough into balls and roll out into thin circles.
o
Brush with melted butter and fold into squares.
o
Cook on a hot griddle until golden on both sides.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Mix flour semolina
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 red bell peppers
o
1/2 cup walnuts
o
1/4 cup breadcrumbs
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 tablespoon pomegranate molasses
o
1 teaspoon cumin
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Roast bell peppers
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Roast bell peppers until charred, then peel and seed.
o
Blend peppers, walnuts, breadcrumbs, minced garlic, olive oil, pomegranate
molasses, cumin, and salt in a food processor until smooth.
o
Serve with pita bread.
Mutabal
*

sections.title: Roast bell peppers
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 eggplants
o
1/4 cup tahini
o
1/4 cup lemon juice
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Roast eggplants
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Roast eggplants until soft, then peel and mash.

sections.title: Roast eggplants
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast
o
1 teaspoon sugar
o
1/2 cup warm water
o
2 1/2 cups flour
o
1/2 cup yogurt
o
1/4 cup melted butter
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Dissolve yeast and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy.
o
Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture, yogurt, and melted butter.
o
Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled.
o
Divide dough into balls and roll out into circles.
o
Cook on a hot griddle until bubbles form, then flip and cook the other side.
o
Brush with melted butter and serve warm.
Nom Du Du (Green Papaya Salad)
*

sections.title: Dissolve yeast and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 green papaya
o
2 carrots
o
1/4 cup peanuts
o
1/4 cup cilantro
o
2 tablespoons fish sauce
o
2 tablespoons lime juice
o
1 tablespoon sugar
o
1-2 Thai chilies
*

sections.title: Peel and shred green
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Peel and shred green papaya and carrots.
o
Crush peanuts and chop cilantro.
o
Mix fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, and sliced chilies in a bowl.
o
Toss shredded papaya, carrots, peanuts, and cilantro with the dressing.
o
Serve chilled.

sections.title: Peel and shred green
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1/4 cup fish sauce
o
1/4 cup lime juice
o
2 tablespoons sugar

sections.title: Mix fish sauce lime
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, minced garlic, and sliced chilies in a bowl.
o
Add water and stir until sugar is dissolved.
o
Serve as a dipping sauce.

sections.title: Mix fish sauce lime
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cucumbers
o
2 cloves garlic
o
2 tablespoons soy sauce
o
1 tablespoon sesame oil
o
1 tablespoon gochugaru (Korean chili powder)
o
1 tablespoon sesame seeds
*

sections.title: Slice cucumbers
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Slice cucumbers thinly.
o
Mix minced garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil, gochugaru, and sesame seeds in a bowl.
o
Toss cucumbers with the dressing.
o
Serve chilled.
Onigiri (Rice Balls)
*

sections.title: Slice cucumbers
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups cooked sushi rice
o
1/4 cup filling (salmon, pickled plum)
o
1 sheet nori (seaweed)
*

sections.title: Wet hands and shape
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Wet hands and shape rice into balls or triangles.
o
Make a small indentation and add filling.
o
Wrap with a strip of nori.
o
Serve immediately.

sections.title: Wet hands and shape
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups tapioca flour
o
1 cup milk
o
1/2 cup butter
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
o
2 eggs
*

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Preheat oven to 375degF (190degC).
o
Heat milk, butter, and salt in a saucepan until boiling.

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
8 ounces wide rice noodles
o
1/2 pound chicken breast
o
1 cup broccoli
o
2 eggs
o
2 tablespoons soy sauce
o
2 tablespoons oyster sauce
o
1 tablespoon sugar
o
1 tablespoon vegetable oil
*

sections.title: Soak rice noodles
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened, then drain.
o
Saute sliced chicken in vegetable oil until cooked, then set aside.
o
Scramble eggs in the same pan.
o
Add noodles, soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sugar, stir to combine.
o
Add broccoli and cooked chicken, stir-fry until heated through.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Soak rice noodles
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
8 ounces rice noodles
o
1/2 pound shrimp
o
2 eggs
o
1 cup bean sprouts
o
1/4 cup peanuts
o
2 tablespoons fish sauce
o
2 tablespoons tamarind paste
o
1 tablespoon sugar
o
1 tablespoon lime juice
o
1/4 cup green onions
*

sections.title: Soak rice noodles
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened, then drain.
o
Saute shrimp in a pan until cooked, then set aside.
